Variables
SharpNeat.​Neat.​Reproduction.​Sexual.​Strategy.​UniformCrossover
namespace SharpNeat.Neat.Reproduction.Sexual.Strategy.UniformCrossover
UniformCrossoverReproductionStrategy
ISexualReproductionStrategy​<T>
public sealed
UniformCrossoverReproductionStrategy​<T>
where T : struct

Uniform crossover.  The genes of the two parent genomes are aligned by innovation ID. The new child genome takes genes from each of the parents with a given probability (e.g. 50%).

Type Parameter
T

Neural network numeric data type.

Construct with the given strategy arguments.

Parameters
isAcyclic
bool

Indicates that the strategy will be operating on acyclic graphs/genomes.

secondaryParentGeneProbability
double

The probability that a gene that exists only on the secondary parent is copied into the child genome.

genomeBuilder
INeatGenomeBuilder<T>

A neat genome builder.

genomeIdSeq
Int32Sequence

Genome ID sequence; for obtaining new genome IDs.

generationSeq
Int32Sequence

A sequence that provides the current generation number.
